website_summaries.verdict: A well-designed shredder that fits conveniently under the desk.
pros: Handling up to 8 pages at a time, this shredder works quickly and efficiently
Cross-cuts to ensure documents can't be reassembled
Exterior is also made of durable materials
We love the auto-off safety feature that activates if the lid is removed
Front window lets you see when the bin is full

customer_reviews.title: AURORA 12 Sheet Cross-cut Shredder
customer_reviews.text: Just received the my Aurora12 sheet cross- cut paper shredder it looks good from the outside but the cutting blades are rusted as you can see the picture. Hoping the company will take action and get their products check before shipping them to the respective customers. Disappointed and Dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am so glad I bought this Shredder
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying to declutter my house, but I did not feel comfortable to disposing paper with important or private information so I decided to purchase a Shredder. I decided to buy this one in 2013 and I still own it five years later. I have been able to shred paper (thin and some thick cardstock paper) as well as credit cards. I have only suffered through two paper jams. I was able to fix it and it continued working.
customer_reviews.author: Iris

customer_reviews.title: Dont bother. One jam and you are done.
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst shredder I have ever bought. With 20 min of usage I got a paper jam. With less than 12 pages. I followed the troubleshooting instructions and then dont work. So with the first full usage this machine is done. Unreal! I had another shredder that was good and james were easy to fix. I moved and it got lost in storage otherwise I would be using that one. The noise doesn't bother me if it shreds.
customer_reviews.author: Mholi

customer_reviews.title: Super fast shredder and powerful too.
customer_reviews.text: This little shredder is a power house! The shredding is fast and efficient. If you shred the capacity which is 8 sheets it shreds at a slower pace. One full bin of shredded paper easily fills a plastic grocery bag. It’s not a large shredder so it easily can be tucked away without it being a sight for sore eyes. It’s cute and powerful!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plug in and it's ready to shred!
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money, especially when you need to protect your information. Feels sturdy but lightweight. It has two parts, the shredder on top and a plastic waste basket on the bottom. Love that it is cross-cut. Looks professional. Small enough to place in a corner. A perfect shredder to get for your home. Can shred paper as well as thicker material such as credit cards. Has three buttons: auto, off, and reverse. I keep it plugged in but only turn it on when I need it. Can hold maybe 100 sheets of paper or less at a time but I would recommend emptying it out before it gets full.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Never worked. Not even once
customer_reviews.text: This shredder was delivered inoperable. I took it out of the box, plugged it in, turned it on, attempted to shred a document and nothing!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Cross-Cut Paper Shredder
customer_reviews.text: I love this shredder, although I wish the basket on which the head sits is a bit smaller than I would have liked. It easily shreds 8 sheets, but I prefer to shred no more than 6, and I tear a 9X11 sheet in half so the shreds don't collect at the edges. I'd had a previous Aurora shredder and loved it too, but after at least 17 years it finally gave up the ghost. It was larger but they're no longer making that affordable for home use. Will definitely buy from same company again.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Flynn

customer_reviews.title: NOT made in america  made in china
customer_reviews.text: The reason why I bought it was I googled it and i got the impression it was made in america.. It wasnt.. box had china on it. I wasted my money on it and i do believe it to be junk in 6 months. , everything made in china IS JUNK , It is made NOT to last. its the progressive commies in america that think THIS kind of product is progress...it is ..its progress to the dump .. just like progressivism in america.. taking us to the junk pile, they could careless about quality they want repeated buys of JUNK
customer_reviews.author: R. Mckee

customer_reviews.title: Received a used shredder
customer_reviews.text: Very upset that I purchased a new item and received a used one.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Fam.

customer_reviews.title: USED, not new!
customer_reviews.text: I just received delivery of this shredder and it is USED, not NEW as described. See photos. C'mon, if you're going to try to pass off an item as new, at least clean it or wipe it down and pack it so that it at least looks new. Now I have to waste my time to return this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Still working
customer_reviews.text: I bought this back in 2014 and it still works it's now 2020! You just have to be careful, don't put more sheets than suggested otherwise it will jam like they told you it would! So that was my own fault for not listening. Also it will eventually over heat. I have a bad habit of waiting until I have a large pile of papers to shred so eventually it over heats stops working for a bit but then is good to go after about 5 / 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: NDG

customer_reviews.title: Works, But Not The Best
customer_reviews.text: We bought a paper shredder from Amazon a few years ago and it's been working great. My mom needed a shredder so I just went with this one. It arrived quickly, I set it up, started shredding her papers, and it immediately jammed. I tried to reverse it and that would not work. It took some work to get the jam undone. I don't believe it can shred 8 pieces at once. One or two and you're safe, but it can't handle much more. It will get the job done for her, but SLOWLY.
customer_reviews.author: magen

customer_reviews.title: I love this shredder!
customer_reviews.text: This shredder makes me want to yell "ANYTHING IS POSSIBLE" just like Tom Haverford. In the 12 years since I've purchased a shredder, a lot of improvements have been made, including making them less noisy. This shredder does the job and quickly. Usually, as a precaution, I only put 3 pieces of paper max to prevent wear-and-tear; in the month that I've had it, it hasn't jammed at all (but my use of it is light, mainly for junk mail with my name on it). I've put different sizes and thicknesses of paper and it's, satisfyingly, shredded them all. Spending a little bit of extra money now means that you won't have to buy another shredder for a long while.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Music

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Shredder For Light/Medium Use
customer_reviews.text: I am not a heavy shredder, but for the amount that I do, this item is perfect. Had it for over a year and I have never had any issues with it. It has never overheated (although it has a button to warn me if it starts to), I love that it's a cross shredder and it is super easy to use. The basket holds a lot and the top is really light so it's easy to take on and off when I need to empty it out. Great product for a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Seagren

customer_reviews.title: As of July 2015, still going strong after 2 years
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I purchased this shredder to replace one that died after overworking it. We got this one because of the price and reviews. I am happy to report that after 2 years (as of July 2015), this shredder is sill going strong. It has served us well. It shreds 8 sheets as advertised, although we usually put a couple less than that. It can also handle credit cards and unopened junk mail envelopes. We do wish that the capacity was greater and that the shreds were smaller...but, both of those things were fully disclosed when we bought it, so no stars deducted for that.
customer_reviews.author: M.T.

customer_reviews.title: Great for making pet bedding or confetti
customer_reviews.text: Pros -Not overheat in 15 minutes of heavy use -produce a lot in short time (photo 1) -not use too much electricity -safe Cons -must do at least three sheet at a time or not cut (photo 3) -bucket too small This great for making bedding for small animals. To buy bedding is expensive for small amount, and uses harsh chemicals that hurt rat lungs. this method has already save me $100 in just three weeks and my rats are happy with no sneezing our coughing.
customer_reviews.author: Kotomori

customer_reviews.title: Misleading description!  It's a STRAIGHT-CUT shredder
customer_reviews.text: I've got straight-cut version of this shredder instead of ordered cross-cut. The description states that this shredder is cross-cut. So I've wasted my money for the awful shredder and, unfortunately, I've missed the period of possible return.The description contains a misleading information. I DO NOT recommend to buy this shredder. Look at my pictures: you can read the rows after shredding!
customer_reviews.author: iii

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: It's definitely important to use this product as directed. Honestly I received this product yesterday and I have been using it today. Set Up was super simple! The power cord comes attached to the shredder part at the top. Ive had a shredder before and this one is much better than my last. This one has 3 modes, off, auto, and reverse. pretty easy to use but I definitely would never attempt to shred more than 6-8 pages at a time in order to preserve the durability of this product. today ive shredded paperwork with staples, cards, and thick envelope pages, all shredded fine.
customer_reviews.author: Raemysterio

customer_reviews.title: Best Bang for Your Buck!
customer_reviews.text: Our big, expensive shredders were both going bad, and we needed something quick for the small office. I decided to try this cheapie. Great choice! The cutter on this looks super heavy-duty. Chomps right through stapled pages. If you do stacks at a time, this does not cut a huge amount of pages and the small size fills up quickly, but for a few pages at a time, it works great and doesn't take up a lot of space. I liked it so much, I bought one for home. We've been using it for 6 months now, and it still works like new.
customer_reviews.author: Lily R

customer_reviews.title: WTF
customer_reviews.text: This shredder did NOT arrive in original packaging as stated in the advertisement. There is a large wad of paper stuck inside the machine so it only works on one side. Is all scratched up on top Really disappointed in the advertisement and the actual delivery. And it was not handed to the recipient it was left on my front porch unattended.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Capable, solid shredder
customer_reviews.text: I'm going through my old orders adding reviews for them; it's hard to believe that I've had this shredder for a full eight years and it's still going. My wife is a teacher and shreds tons of paper at the end of each school year, so this thing has certainly been taken through the wringer and has handled it admirably. The device doesn't sound exactly like spring chicken anymore, but it keeps chugging; we've just been a bit more careful to only insert no more than a handful of pages at a time. The shredder cutter is quite heavy and feels feels very sturdy. It also has a slot for credit cards, which is convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Ward

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent home office essential
customer_reviews.text: This paper shredder works well. It has three modes managed by one slider button: an "always-on" mode, so that it sits passively until you put paper into it, and it begins shredding automatically; an "off" mode, which is helpful when my curious grandson visits; and a "reverse" mode, in case something isn't going through properly. It sits unobtrusively - like most shredders, it's essential a wastebasket with a window on it (so you can see how full it is - helpful), with the shredder machine sitting on top. This makes it slightly top-heavy, but it's built properly so there is no concern with tipping over.
customer_reviews.author: Calivati

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shredder!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly and at such a good price. It is easy to assemble and use. I also appreciate how the shredder doesn't actually run unless there is a paper that has been inserted; it was a pleasant surprise and a cool energy-saving feature. My last shredder is from like 2001, so it has been a while since I have looked at any new ones. I am not sure if this energy feature is standard now, but I love it! The product came slightly damaged with a cracked bin window, but Amazion was super cool about it and gave me a discount for the damage. I really appreciated their customer service! Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Complete Garbage
customer_reviews.text: This is the second I bought to replace the other one that the plastic inside broke and I have to wait 1 month to use my Amazon insurance to get the money back. I will NOT be buying one of these again. All I do is put mail through this--letters and somehow, the insides/workmanship on this unit keeps breaking. Not again. This one was even more cheaply made than its predecessor. Horrible and cheap in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Sheilah S.

customer_reviews.title: Decent home shredder
customer_reviews.text: The shredder is fast and automatic, remember to remove staples and paperclips to prolong blade life. The strips aren’t so small they can’t be reconstructed, but for most the size will be small enough to deter it. My first use was about a ream of older documents, and feeding 3-4 sheets at a time didn’t seem to bog it down, but more than that made it sound like it was working harder,, though it never jammed. A ream of paper filled a tall kitchen garbage bag with shred. So I had to empty the bin several times, which can be a bit messy. All-in-all, I liked it, and feel it’ll meet my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great Shredder
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a shredder I bought a year or so ago from BestBuy. The first thing I noticed was that the top part with the blades was much heavier than the old one. This shredder does a great job. It really does go thru 6 or 8 sheets at once. I put junk mail in it unopened and it just chews them up and spits them into the bucket. I haven't run into the situation where it got too hot and shut off. My older one would occasionally over heat because I could only put 2-3 sheets in at once, so it was running twice as long. Great shredder for home use.
customer_reviews.author: Tony M

customer_reviews.title: great little shredder
customer_reviews.text: this item is really nice, nice smaller design, love the option to load several sheets of paper and walk away, the small size of the shredded paper is great. only reason I give it a 4 is it sounds like its working really hard if you use more than two sheets at a time or a thick sheet of paper. its still new so lets see how long it last.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not home office shredder!
customer_reviews.text: This shredder is very small and suited for a home (not home office). It's good if you're only shredding items occasionally. It does have a tendency to shutdown often (like doing 6 pieces of regular paper, 4x in a row). Then you have to wait until it cools. Pay attention to the measurements! It's small and it's loud. What it shreds it does nicely. (1L x 1/4W inch strips). I haven't tried plastic so I can't comment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shredder for the price
customer_reviews.text: Glad I purchased the shredder. Any shredder is going to be loud, but it was able to shred what I needed without any issues and was fast. I love the fact that the blades are covered as I have a toddler and i carefully have her help me. However, I do unplug this when not in use just as a safety measure. There is a button to slide on/off, but again I just unplug it. I highly recommend this shredder. It was the cheapest one I was looking it, so I wasn't sure what to expect. I am glad I purchased this one, it exceeded my expectations and is way better than my previous shredder.
customer_reviews.author: bulldogmom

customer_reviews.title: A problem, which was resolved with some support assistance...
customer_reviews.text: After 45 days, shredder stopped working. As noted elsewhere, I contacted support... They correctly diagnosed a particularly grim paper jam. It was solved by apply extra oil liberally to weaken the paper in the jam, then judicious surgery with a letter opener. It now works again... (note, however, that it is now making a "thump" on every revolution of the shredding gizmo, but, so far, that does not seem to be affecting its performance.) It has been working as expected, save for this problem -- so I am content for the moment.
customer_reviews.author: M. T.

customer_reviews.title: Used as directed didn’t last 3 months 😢
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in June prior to retirement in August. I used only a few times. 2-3 days ago I was using it and it shut off because it got hit. Now it won’t come back on at all. Very disappointed wish it wasn’t to late for a refund. This was NOT worth the price what so ever. I filled maybe 3-4 bags in total!😫😤
customer_reviews.author: Susan Munson

customer_reviews.title: Jams frequently, for no reason
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly quiet. But it suddenly jams for no reason, even with only three standard paper pieces. The other negative is it seems very sensitive to the bin being filled, even if it has half full but the most recently shredding is mounded and touching the top. Would have helped, too, if there was a light (like my old machine) indicating when it was full. It will stop during mid-shred, you have to stop and empty bin but they it acts as those it's jammed because the shred job is still in process.
customer_reviews.author: AudieMurphy

customer_reviews.title: Great Shredder!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, holds up, doesn’t break down, very happy with it. I broke my daughter’s mini little shredder by putting too much paper in it at once. She didn’t ask, or need to use it right away, so I didn’t tell her. I just ordered this right away. I left it in her room for her when it came in. Luckily, it was very fast delivery. She asked what the big box was & I told her what happened. Thankfully, she wasn’t upset, especially since I did replace it, & she loves this shredder even more than the one she had before.
customer_reviews.author: Harlie D

customer_reviews.title: Replaced just to have it get jammed and inoperable. Crap product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in February 2020. Now on June 2, 2020 it died. Not shredding, making a clicking sound. I called the 1800 number on the shredder and thy said to cut the cord and send the cord back, to the company who made it. And they will send me a new one, hopefully.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J

customer_reviews.title: Quiet
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old shredder died. This one so far seems good. It is harder to move around with my legs - a little more friction. Definitely quieter than the old clunker. Takes 12 sheets but caveat- and they tell you this- a folded paper counts as two. So actually an envelope could count as two. I have not had it long so I can’t say how well it will hold up to my household cleaning abuse. I never do credit cards in a shredder due to recycling, so no review on cutting that stuff up
customer_reviews.author: n shish

customer_reviews.title: Very good for 1 year... then broken
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shredder, worked really fine for 1 year. I did all required maintenance, applied shredder oil, I've never put more than 5 regular sheets at the same time. It is for home use, I've used it no more than once a week for a couple of paper sheets. Some days ago it made a strong noise and I've noticed it is broken. Thank God I bought the insurance for this unit and those guys from Asurion gave me a gift card in 2 days after my claim.
customer_reviews.author: GUSTAVO P BECKER

customer_reviews.title: Great Cross-Cut Shredder
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. First use I had two garbage bags of shredded paper. Only jammed one time and it was kind of me as I accidently reversed the shredder when the basket had gotten too full and It sucked up a few trimmings. Its fun to occupy your time if you are bored. Just make sure you read your mail and it is the right thing to shred and destroy. Time will tell but I really like this shredder the first one I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Sondra's Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 9 monts
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how this got such great reviews! Previous shredder lasted nearly 15 years... this one dead in 9 months. Very disappointed. I'd suggest you try a different brand... as will I
customer_reviews.author: Mi Grammy

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this item!
customer_reviews.text: As an Amazon buyer PAR EXCELLENT (Check my buying record) I'm writing To tell you that the shredder does live up to the website description as advertised that the machine is ANTI-JAM PROOF. It shreds single sheets of paper OK, but not CREDIT CARDS. I tried to CUT a single Credit card and the machine JAMMED. I have tried to run the Shredder forward and reverse many times but to no avail. The machine still remains JAMMED. I would like a refund even at this late date. WHAT WILL YOU DO FOR A LOYAL AND FREQUENT BUYER AND CUSTOMER, SUCH AS I?
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Graveline

customer_reviews.title: Good but doesn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: This shredder has a nice look to it, but it is a little noisy and I’ve had it for a few weeks and it is no longer working. It shreds 8 pages at a time. I would try and do 4 at the most just to be careful and now when it is turned to auto mode it just keeps going and won’t take in any paper. Money down the drain for me.
customer_reviews.author: BOBBIE

customer_reviews.title: BROKE AFTER ONE FULL BIN OF USAGE
customer_reviews.text: This shredder simply stopped working after one full basket of infrequent use. I unplugged the shredder and dumped the paper and when I attempt to use it afterwards it simply just went dead on me. I would not recommend this product at all due to its lack of quality.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Tang

customer_reviews.title: Two different user guide downloads on Amazon product page with different instructions
customer_reviews.text: There is a “User Guide” pdf listed on the Amazon product page, which actually has the name “Shredder User Manual” on the title page of the pdf. This is a pdf of the hard copy included in the box the in which the shredder arrived. On the Amazon product page, there is a second pdf listed: “User Manual” pdf. It contains different instructions for oiling the shredder, and notably says to use “nothing petroleum based.”
customer_reviews.author: Roger Lier

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy little shredder
customer_reviews.text: Every year I clear out my files of old bills/bank statements/tax forms. My old shredder crapped out on me, so I ordered this one with some oil for maintenance. It worked like a champ! After every 15 mins. of continuous use, I let it cool off so it would not overheat, and I had all my shredding done in an hour (about a 5 in. stack). I did only put in 6 sheets at a time so as not to stress it too much. I was very happy with result.
customer_reviews.author: Mona13

customer_reviews.title: Better Then Expected
customer_reviews.text: I've had the Aurora shredder for over a month and I am most surprised at how well it works. It cuts paper and plastic credit cards easily and quickly. It is super easy to operate and it appears that when the container is full, it is very easy to empty. The price was great. I've had no problems thus far. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: DrJohn

customer_reviews.title: Great home shredder
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a home shredder for documents, receipts, things I wasn't comfortable just throwing away. This shredder has the cross cut feature and works as described. I had a work shredder that didn't do as good as this one! Highly recommend! Only downside is I wish it was a bit quieter, my older, blind dog freaks out with it. I just don't use it when she's in the room.
customer_reviews.author: MzTweety

customer_reviews.title: Great for home use
customer_reviews.text: I don't need to shred large volumes of mail or documents, and this machine works fine for me. If you want to shred junk mail envelopes, make sure they're pretty thin; I tried to shred a fairly thick mailing from AAA and jammed the machine. Totally my bad, the instruction book warns about this. Even so, it was easy to clear. the jam. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: Smart paper shredder
customer_reviews.text: This shredder is defintely a good purchase. I have had it a few weeks and have used it several times. It is much quieter then my previous shredder and I really like it. I am so happy that I purchaed this shredder.
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for the first week of shredding. Then the rubber broke.
customer_reviews.text: I used this shredder for several boxes of paper right after I bought it and it worked great. Pulled it out again recently and something inside of it broke on the second folder of papers I put in -- and none of that was too thick. My assessment is that the gears are good but the rubber/plastic holding them is not strong enough.
customer_reviews.author: PJ Woodside

customer_reviews.title: Good shredder at a good price
customer_reviews.text: I've had one of these longer than I can remember, and have shredded thousands of credit card receipts, invoices, offers, bank statements, etc, as well as dozens if not hundreds of old credit cards. I bought this one for a relative whose shredded had burnt out, and she is very happy with it. I don't know how it would hold up in an office environment in daily use but it's been very satisfactory for me to use at home.
customer_reviews.author: JS2012

customer_reviews.title: Not working after 4 months with normal use
customer_reviews.text: After less than 4 months the product stopped shredding. Purchase date January 24- obituary end date for product May 22 The product stopped shredding. The Aurora makes a high pitched noise but does not shred. I tried the anti jam and made sure nothing is stuck. It shred 1/8 of 1 page and jammed up again. After making sure there is no blockage it does the same thing. This is the new normal for the product
customer_reviews.author: Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase For a "Basic" Shredder!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Everything that I've needed to shred has gone down pretty easily. Stacks of bills, thicker mailers, and even credit cards, just disappear quickly into the slot...no chugging or bogging down. I've used shredders twice as expensive as this one, and still I'd say that it out-performs most that I've used. For a small office or home-use, this is a great purchase in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Trey

customer_reviews.title: Aurora Cross Cut Shredder
customer_reviews.text: Small and compact and looks good but I was disappointed that the cross cut shred was not fine enough. The pieces are long and they look more like a regular shredder. The shredder that I had to replace did a better job at cross cutting. For a few dollars more, I probably should have ordered the Amazon Basic Cross Cut Shredder.
customer_reviews.author: F. Simmy

customer_reviews.title: Had my last Aurora for 10+ years so this is the brand for me
customer_reviews.text: I had my last Aurora shredder for well over 10 years before it started sparking so I was in favor of the brand. This one is not nearly as loud as my last one. It does a great job shredding. I was worried about shredding credit cards but it seems to do great. Since the top is so heavy and the bottom is lightweight plastic I do wish it was wider to be more balanced. There has to be a better design. But it does what I need it to do. Someone had given me a cheap shredder and it was terrible! This one is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Eppich

customer_reviews.title: Great price for the product
customer_reviews.text: First thing's first for paying at value price -- thank goodness it's not cheap. Shredded all the papers we've been saving up to shred and seems fairly durable (only couple weeks of use). Very heavy top sits on a bucket that will need to be emptied often, but that's easy enough. Forgot to check manufacturing country of origin, but corp is American and can be searched for and (maybe) held accountable for faulty product unlike pop-up Amazon vendors w/ no websites. Will update review if issues arise, but great first impression.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: It's broken already, less than a week.
customer_reviews.text: It has been less than a week and this thing is already broken. It won't take in paper anymore - just keeps spinning and spinning.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with a crack in the bin
customer_reviews.text: It should get the job done. While it shouldn't impact the function, it's annoying that the bin came with a glaringly visible crack in the side.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Shred them docs at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.text: Been wanting to upgrade my old shredder and based on reviews took the leap. This does not disappoint. It can easily handle several pieces of paper at a time. My previous one could only hands 2-3 max. In addition it shreds in tiny pieces. Highly recommend for your office. Noise level is normal. Not too loud.
customer_reviews.author: L. Tran

customer_reviews.title: Aurora AS890C Shredder
customer_reviews.text: This unit is perfect for my use. Shreds confidential documents with ease. Just need to keep in mind the thickness and quantity of the paper being fed into it. Standard paper 6-8 sheets, thicker paper takes less sheets at a time. Instructions not clear, but called Aurora and they confirmed sheet lubricants are good to use for lubrication. Last shredder (cheap Omnitech) I had lasted a few years. Look for this one to outlast.
customer_reviews.author: Richard S Kobre

customer_reviews.title: DON'T HESITATE TO BUY!
customer_reviews.text: So far I am absolutely loving this little shredder! It's compact, powerful, and is a cross cut, rather than just strips. It has an auto start feature so I leave it on and feed it documents as needed. I haven't tried feeding it paper clips but it seems to be handling staples just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be very careful what you feed shedder
customer_reviews.text: I just received yesterday and within a few hours I had a paper jam, and I was careful to feed only few sheets at a time. The shedder shut off and I can't get blockage to clear up, I used oil as they said to no avail. Shedder will not turn back on, so shortest lived purchase ever. Be aware that it does not handle 8 sheets, and I had been feeding it about six. No way to be able to get it unnamed. Very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Coronavirus approved runs for hours and hours
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed been using the hell out of this during the coronavirus shut down. If you're not paying attention to how full basket is it will clog.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Would like the item replaced without return due to the above
customer_reviews.text: I need to return this item or get a refund because it is not functioning as promoted. I did not keep the box return and I am post breast cancer and would have a very difficult time boxing this thing back up and returning it I would like the item replaced as it did seem to function but it looks as if it was possibly a refurbished model as there was rust on the gearing when I did look at it
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Great Shredder
customer_reviews.text: This thing shreds with ease. I have yet to jam it and I have shredded about 30 pounds of paper so far. The only thing I wish for is a slightly larger basket. I have so much mail and old papers I need to shred and removing the head to empty is a bit cumbersome as the head is very heavy. But that is expected given the teeth on this thing, very heavy duty. I expect it to last for a while.
customer_reviews.author: L. Price

customer_reviews.title: Works well but noisy
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy for the money. I don't have a lot to shred so this was perfect. It's a little taller than a small garbage can so it easily fits under my desk. It effectively shreds paper. I've had no jams and I've had it a couple months. The only drawback is it is noisy.
customer_reviews.author: doczack

customer_reviews.title: Broken and deliver late
customer_reviews.text: Unit was delivered a day later than promised by Amazon. Unit arrived broken. Will not even power on. Used three different outlets with one being what my computer would use. Ensured it was seated into the trash bin properly. even used a flat tip to activate the rear safety switch. not operational at all. what a shame. you can have it back.
customer_reviews.author: Kori B.

customer_reviews.title: OK shredder. Heated quickly
customer_reviews.text: If you have never used another home shredder before then probably you will love it. But compared to another, i would say that the noise from this is higher. While it has 2 sheets more intake capacity(8 sheets) than most compact models, it got hot quickly (less than 100 sheets approx) and it took a long time(a few hours) to reset itself. Keep that in mind when you get it.
customer_reviews.author: Tami Brown

customer_reviews.title: A good buy
customer_reviews.text: Very portable from left side of sofa to the other. 12 page minimum is best as described in description but be cautious of over heating shredder. It takes overs half hour for it to cool down. If you have trash bags with 14 years of papers it can get frustrating but over all it is truly a great product. There might be better shredders but this one is worth the money
customer_reviews.author: christopher

customer_reviews.title: Really nice shredder
customer_reviews.text: Received it today already used. Much quieter than my last shredder. Works great. The only problem was delivery, it was quick and early, however, it was not left on my porch but on edge of driveway highly visible from street not happy about that. Everything else really good
customer_reviews.author: Shirley James

customer_reviews.title: 💜I recommend buying it.💜
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely needed this shredder for paper recycling on my projects. Since I need it to endure the projects life I won't be shredding 8 pages at once but if slim 3 at a time and if thick just 2 at a time, just to extend the blade's life. Also, I bought the sharpening and oiling shredding pages for maintenance.
customer_reviews.author: Vimarie

customer_reviews.title: Served Us Well
customer_reviews.text: We bought this item a few years ago on a big move. It served us well, through two moves. It just stopped working on us mid shred about a month ago. Sad to see it go. Serious value for our dollar. Would buy again but we'd like something possibly more updated. If not, we'll be back!
customer_reviews.author: Jay/Jae

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.
customer_reviews.text: I replaced the shredded that I had used for the past 12 years. This one is all plastic, but seems to work well. It is somewhat difficult to load, but does a good job with minimal noise. Easily does 6 sheets, but is very slow with 8 sheets. Have only shredded 100 pages or so, by no glitches or jams to date.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew O. Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Only shredded 1 piece of paper before it stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Got it and excitedly plugged it in, ready to get rid of a pile of documents I've been waiting to shred. Plugged it in, turned it on, and had the green "ready" light. Dropped in the first document and it shredded wonderfully. Put in the next one and, nothing. Green ready light still on and you hear the sensor engaging but nothing. Tried turning off and on, still nothing. There is no jam, I only shredded 1 piece of paper. Put in reverse and nothing. Hopefully the replacement works. Don't waste your time like I have.
customer_reviews.author: echo

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This shredder works great! Since I’ve had it it has not given me any issues and I love that now as soon as I know there is mail with personal info I can simply go to the shredder and not worry about info being out there in my trash. Like every other shredder out there of course it’s noisy, but nothing extremely loud. It also shreds credit cards so it’s a plus for me!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Bad purchase
customer_reviews.text: Shredder stopped working after 2 uses! Won't even turn on! Never had so much trouble with a shredder! Would not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Angel L.

customer_reviews.title: Efficient and Reliable
customer_reviews.text: After several months of frequent use, I am impressed with the efficiency and reliability of my Aurora Cross Cut Shredder. The clearly written instruction booklet is kept nearby for ready reference. As a reward for shredding well done, Aurora non-flammable synthetic shredder oil has been purchased. Sold separately. And yes, I happily remove staples and paper clips.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: The removable top is relatively heavy and awkward to take off and on. When you put the top back on make sure it's facing in the right position to activate shredder. Works very well to shred in small pieces and for shredding cards, etc. Turns off when over-heated for about 10 minutes. Tremendous help with a very large shredding job.
customer_reviews.author: Sef

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Shredder
customer_reviews.text: This product was quiet, did not jam, was not messy and did a very good job. Very pleased, as my last shredder took 3 times longer to do the same job, with constant jams and overheating.
customer_reviews.author: bkoman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Shredder
customer_reviews.text: This shredder turned out to be a workhorse. I was able to shred for close to an hour without it overheating. It took about a half hour to cool down, and then I was able to continue shredding. The only drawback I noticed, was the shredded paper in the basket started to lift the lid when the basket got overfilled. Unfortunately for me, I ignored the window in the basket, and just kept shredding. This won't happen if you're mindful of the shredded paper through the window. Happy Shredding!
customer_reviews.author: kgoiii

customer_reviews.title: I used it the first day it arrive in the mail and then it stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing and most likely will not be repurchasing this shredder in the future! I will also will not be recommending it to anyone. The lights that should tell you if the machine is overheating NEVER came on after I used it the first day then it just quit working altogether no lights came on after that day and since then. I threw the box away that it came in the mail in and so now I'm stuck with a broken shredder machine that doesn't work. So I'm not sure if I can even my money back or if they can send me a new one. Ugh!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: more than a little frustrating
customer_reviews.text: It has a weird internal edge that blocks you from easily feeding the paper into the feeder slot. You have to change the angle on it several times to get it to feed in. Not convenient and more than a little frustrating when you just want to lean over and throw a few sheets through it. Instead you have to screw around with it to get it to feed in.
customer_reviews.author: ML-L

customer_reviews.title: Do not line the basket with trashbag.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this shredder, it works great. At first, I had no problems with this, but after I emptied it, it didn't work. Of course, my return window was closed. Luckily it was a very easy fix. After I Googled the problem, I discovered that there was a sensor in the device and the head had to fit on the basket a certain way. The trash bag that I lined it with interfered with the sensor mechanism. I am glad I googled the issue, saved me from purchasing another.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just What I needed.
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that this little shredder is just the right size to stick in the bottom of my closet when I don't need to use it. It shreds those plastic credit cards with barely a hiccup. I hope to have it for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Trician

customer_reviews.title: A real workhorse
customer_reviews.text: I was replacing a lighter duty Aurora shredder that died after 4 years steady service. I decided to go with this shredder that is more heavy duty, and so far I am very pleased with my choice. This shredder can handle more pages on a single pass and is quieter than my previous unit. This also calls for a regular lubrication which should extend it's useful life.
customer_reviews.author: paul in nj

customer_reviews.title: Takes 12 sheets of paper!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to empty and I can line basket with plastic bag, it still operates. So easy to empty this lil one! GREAT SHREDDER!
customer_reviews.author: Carole

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace a cheaper version that you could attach to your garbage disposal. It did not last long and sucked when putting it through the shredder. This one is great and so far has not hung up or paper stuck when shredding. Get one, for the price, cannot go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Apostle65

customer_reviews.title: 12 sheets ANTI-JAM?
customer_reviews.text: Just got this in today. Been looking for a decent shredder that can handle heavy load tho I would not be using it heavily. ie. Max I shredded today was 6 sheets at a time. JAM JAM JAM. That's all I have to say. got through my stack I've been needing to destroy by the hardest.
customer_reviews.author: mel

customer_reviews.title: Great Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money. Easy to use. Quite for office use. And extremely durable. I had this same unit and it lasted over 10 years in everyday use at the office. Great value for the money. I am on my second unit and if I get another ten years out this shredder I will be elated.
customer_reviews.author: Mark DeZuba

customer_reviews.title: Did not last a year
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in Jan 2019 and stopped working Nov 2019. Warranty window closed and no way to return or replace item. I will reach out to Vendor but I will not hold my breath. Buy one from Walmart and purchase an extended warranty. I will update once I get response from Vendor. No more electronics from Amazon for me.
customer_reviews.author: pcmscout

customer_reviews.title: Good for episodic use
customer_reviews.text: As others have mentioned, this Aurora cross-shredder has its limitations but if the user knows that, the shredder works fine. The basket is very small although easily emptied. The shredder can take 4-5 pages almost continuously for up to 15 minutes, any more and it will freeze for up to 15 minutes before it will restart. Once the limitations of the shredder are recognized, then it has performed appropriately. Not great, you can't be in a rush but.....the price is right and it does its deed without incident when treated gingerly. I certainly will not return the Aurora AS890C because with the occasional shredding we need, this is good product.
customer_reviews.author: Analytical Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Great for standard home needs
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after considering between multiple options and have no regrets. The bin is large enough for multiple documents to be shredded. As long as I don't put more than the recommended amount of papers (8) in the shredder, then it runs very smoothly and quietly.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Miller

customer_reviews.title: Not new?
customer_reviews.text: Arrived dirty! I don't see it noted online that they test them before shipping so I can only assume its used?!
customer_reviews.author: P.G.

customer_reviews.title: If used for a period of time it over heats
customer_reviews.text: Worked well but basket fills quickly if it is used a lot it over heats &shuts down
customer_reviews.author: Home owner  to fix

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Shredder Shreds. I'm happy with it. It does make enough sound that I wouldn't shred at midnight when my neighbors are asleep, but electric shredders are always noisy, not just this one. Good workhorse of a machine for home use.
customer_reviews.author: chromodynamica

customer_reviews.title: The shredder only worked for one day.
customer_reviews.text: Sorry to say that this is the first item ever ordered from Amazon that we are very unpleased with. I only used it once and it broke, just stopped when I was using it. Nothing is caught so I don't understand why it still isn't working. I would not recommend this particular shredder to anyone. So sorry for the bad news. Everything we ever ordered from Amazon, we were beyond pleased until the shredder. Thank you, Marie Pyfer (mother) Maria Langiewicz (daughter) marialang10@yahoo.com
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like Butter
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this shredder. It replaces a model that cost more. This is quiet and seems to have no fear of paper... destroying bills and other annoying things that despite our preferences still arrive in the mail.
customer_reviews.author: G.P.

customer_reviews.title: Works.
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after about 2 months of light use. Have tried multiple outlets, and the power won't turn on. Disappointed, as this is my first home shredder. /Update Moving from 1 star to 4. Previous review was down to user error / lid not being set properly. this shredder worked very well at first, but the feeder's responsiveness has wained after some use. Still works, but I need to jostle single sheets in from time to time to trigger the shredding censor. Would recommend at price point.
customer_reviews.author: migzee tigglez

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never owned a paper shredder before so I have nothing to compare it to, but it’s been great! I finally got tired of shredding documents by hand and realized, as an adult, I can buy a paper shredder. I don’t try to do huge bulk amounts or anything. I have shredded cards as well. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Kcb

customer_reviews.title: Just OK for small light jobs, but not a true 12 page shredder
customer_reviews.text: Product states it’s a 12 sheet shredder. Maybe notebook paper, but anything else it’s more like 7 sheets. Shredding old brokerage or bank statements is a real challenge for this unit. After about 20 minutes it shut down for a couple of hours. If you have lots of shredding, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: P. R. Yamshon

customer_reviews.title: Superb Shredder
customer_reviews.text: I have used this shredder for over a year now - It still runs just like new. I have had instances where I shredded too many papers at once (my own fault), and the only hiccup I had was that it takes a while to un-jam it. The reverse button helps, but because it is already jammed up- you have to really work to get them out. It would be nice if it was able to open up a bit more, like a hinge or something. I have only had this happen on a few instances. Overall this Shredder is incredible for the price, I would definitely buy the product again, if this one ever quits on me.
customer_reviews.author: Tanille

customer_reviews.title: Works Nicely
customer_reviews.text: The overheat light has not turned on after many hours of shredding. I limit input to five sheets at a time and use lubricating sheets after one hour of use. So far it is working well, smooth and quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Experto6

product_meta.title: Aurora AS890C 8-Sheet Cross-Cut Paper/Credit Card Shredder with Basket
product_meta.description:
Style:AS890C 8-Sheet CrossCut| Pattern Name:ShredderAurora 8 Sheet Cross Cut Paper Shredder with Basket featuring Overload/Overheat Protection, Auto Start, and Manual Reverse to Clear Paper Jams

AMAZON.COM
Turn private documents and sensitive information into confetti at the rate of eight pages per minute with the Aurora Crosscut Paper Shredder. The shredder's stainless steel blades slice through folded paper, staples, paper clips, and even credit cards quickly and efficiently. To maximize the security of your personal information, the blades cut across and down, leaving one-fifth-inch-wide strips of paper. With an attached 125-sheet-capacity wastepaper basket, this shredder is a practical addition to any home or small office.

 

The AS890C 8 Sheet Light Duty Crosscut Shredder offers:  * Stainless steel blades that cut through credit cards, staples and paper clips.
 * Cross-cut technology turns documents into confetti.
 * Shred rate of 8.36 pages per minute.
 * 125-sheet-capacity wastebasket.
 * Manual reverse mode for clearing paper jams.



Feed as many as 8 sheets of paper at a time into the shredder. View larger. 

The AS890C has no problems with paper clips, staples, and credit cards. Cross-cut Shredding for Better Security
Whether you're disposing of financial statements, personal information, or junk mail, this shredder's cross-cut technology offers high-security protection. Insert as many as eight pages into the 8.7-inch entry slot and watch through the viewing window as the paper is quickly sliced across and down into 1/5 inch scraps. Even if your documents are folded in half or riddled with staples, the stainless steel blades will quickly shred your documents so that you can dispose of them safely. Perfect Size for Home or Small Office
The shredder's black color and moderate size (12 x 7 x 16 inches) make it a tasteful and practical addition to a small home or office space. A 59-inch power cord allows you to store it far from power outlets. When the time comes to empty the attached wastebasket, a full-bag indicator light will alert you. But with a 125-sheet-capacity wastebasket, you won't need to empty it often.

 For maximum convenience, you can simply leave the shredder in auto start mode. Each time paper is inserted, a sensor will activate the blades. If more than eight pages are inserted at a time, the manual reverse mode can come in handy to clear a temporary paper jam. In case of heavy use, the shredder also features thermal overload protection to keep the unit from overheating.

 What's in the Box
Aurora 8 Sheet Crosscut Shredder with Basket. 

 


FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Aurora AS890C 8 Sheet Crosscut Paper/Credit Card Shredder with Basket is a heavy-duty paper shredder that shreds credit cards, paper clips and staples. This paper shredder has a 8.7-inch throat and features a 125-sheet-capacity basket.

See more
feature_bullets: Crosscut paper and credit card shredder destroys your sensitive documents
Shreds credit cards, paper clips and staples

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars4,834 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
